class="feed-post-body-resumo">Carioca assume a liderança do ranking e está a uma etapa de título histórico para as mulheres: &quot;O que aconteceu foi diferente de tudo. Deixei de lado a minha competitividade e só procurei me divertir&quot;</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="8"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/radicais/surfe/mundial-de-surfe/noticia/lesionado-italo-fica-fora-de-etapas-australianas-e-so-volta-em-saquarema.ghtml" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover bstn-fd-video-cover" style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" alt="Italo fica fora de etapas australianas e só volta no Brasil;                    title="Lima Jr./Divulgação"></div><div class="card-opiniao-quote"><blockquote class="card-opiniao-quote-title gui-color-primary vertical"><p class="card-opiniao-quote-title-conteudo"><h2 class="card-opiniao-quote-subtitle"

    var glb_realtime_map = {
        site: 'globoesporte',
        categories: ['home'],
        url: 'http://globoesporte.globo.com/radicais/surfe/'
    };

    var realtime = function(realtimeLoaded, msg){
        if(realtimeLoaded){
            return;
        }

        $.getScript('http://s.glbimg.com/bu/rt/js/glb-rt.js', function(){
            $.ajax({
                dataType: 'jsonp',
                
                url: 'http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/globoesporte/json/globoesporte-home-agregador.js',
                
                jsonpCallback: 'glbrealtime_callback',
                cache: true,
                success: function(json){
                    $.glbrealtime({
                        data: json,
                        debug: false
                    });
                }
            });
        });
    }

    var realtimeLoaded = false;

    $(window).on('load', function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "onLoad");
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    })

    setTimeout(function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "timeout")
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    }, 3000);

</script><link rel="stylesheet"
                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><style type="text/css">
/* Nova votacao, palco */

    display: none !important;
  }

}

<ul class="nwl-news-of-day" id="articles">
<script id="articles-template" type="text/x-handlebars-template">
          {{#each articles}}            

            <li id="nativeads_position_{{@index}}" class="{{#not_empty cover_image_url}}nwl-has-img{{/not_empty}} nwl-row {{#if showDate}}new-date{{/if}}">

              {{/if}}

              <div class="wrap-li">
                <span class="nwl-news-time">{{timeFormat first_published_at}}</span>

                <span data-href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-wpr-cover box">
                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">                      
                      <div class="image-holder" style="position: relative">

                        </a>

        <ul class="r7-shareit small">
          <li data-social-type="facebook" title="Compartilhe no Facebook" class="r7-icons r7-facebook shareit"></li>

    </div>

                </span>
                {{/not_empty}}

                <div class="nwl-info">
                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">
                    <p class="nwl-news-title">

                    </p>
                    <p class="nwl-news-title link-holder">
                      <a data-social-headline="{{section_name}}"  data-social-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-shorten="{{url}}" href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-link" target="{{is_r7_domain url}}">
                        {{treatment_title title}}
                      </a>
                      <img class="hidden" src="{{cover_image_url}}" />

                    <div class="r7-social-media-bar">
                      <ul class="r7-social-media mini" data-shorten="{{url}}" data-image="{{cover_image_url}}" data-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-headline="{{section_name}}">
                        <li class="r7-share r7-icons r7-facebook shareit" data-social-type="facebook" title="Compartilhe no Facebook">
                          Compartilhe no Facebook
                        </li>
                        <li class="r7-share r7-icons r7-twitter shareit" data-social-type="twitter" title="Compartilhe no Twitter">
                          Compartilhe no Twitter
                        </li>
                        <li class="r7-share r7-icons r7-gPlus shareit" data-social-type="gPlus" title="Compartilhe no Google Plus">

                        </li>
                      </ul>
                    </div>

                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>

              </div>
            </li>
          {{/each}}
        </script>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<div class="clearfix"></div>
<div class="pagination" id="articles-pagination"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

pagespeed.deferIframe.convertToIframe();</script></pagespeed_iframe>
</div>
<div id="report_error_box" class="hidden">
<a title="Fechar" class="fechar" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="modal.remove()">X</a>
<h5>Comunicar Erro</h5>
<form action="/r7/service/contactus/addContactUsSimple.jsp" onsubmit="validaCampos(this, event)" target="postcontactus" method="post" name="form_contactus">
<fieldset>
<div class="desc">Preencha os campos abaixo para informar o R7 sobre os erros encontrados nas nossas reportagens.</div>
<div id="msg-callback">
<div id="successMessage" class="sucesso">
<span class="iconOk"></span>
Mensagem enviada com Sucesso!
</div>
<div id="errorMessage">
<span class="iconAlert"></span>
Erro ao enviar mensagem, tente novamente!
</div>
</div>
<div class="campo">
<label for="report_name">*Seu nome: </label>
<input type="text" onblur="campoObrig(this)" onfocus="campoTextFoco(this)" title="até 120 caracteres" value="até 120 caracteres" maxlength="120" class="required text" id="report_name" name="nome"/>
<span></span>
</div>
<div class="campo">
<label for="report_email">*Seu e-mail: </label>
<input type="text" onblur="campoObrig(this)" onfocus="campoTextFoco(this)" title="até 120 caracteres" value="até 120 caracteres" maxlength="120" class="required email" id="report_email" name="email" class="text"/>
<span></span>
</div>
<div class="campo">
<label for="report_message">*Comentários: </label>
<textarea onblur="campoObrig(this)" onfocus="campoTextFoco(this)" title="digite aqui sua mensagem" rows="3" cols="5" id="report_message" name="mensagem" class="required text">digite aqui sua mensagem</textarea>
<span></span>
</div>

<input type="hidden" value="true" name="customEmail"/>
<input type="hidden" value="8A488A52236838B8012368418C850D04" name="serviceInstanceId" id="contactUs_serviceInstanceId"/>

<div class="campo">
